General.Name: Maoming Petro-Chemical Shihua Co Ltd
General.Description: Maoming Petro-Chemical Shihua Co., Ltd manufactures and sells petrochemicals in the People's Republic of China. It offers polypropylene, liquefied petroleum gas, commercial propane butane mixture, sec-butyl acetate, methyl tert-butyl ether, light white oil, ethanolamine, isobutane, refined propane, hydrogen peroxide, carbon nine, etc. The company is also involved in the gasoline and diesel fueling, LPG loading, and chemical product trading business. Maoming Petro-Chemical Shihua Co., Ltd was founded in 1988 and is based in Maoming, the People's Republic of China.
